titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: Cancer Registration Data Set (Retired) - Overview

p.b: The Cancer Registration Data Set has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary as it has been replaced by the Cancer Outcomes and Services Data Set
The last live version of the Cancer Registration Data Set is available in the November 2012 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
